name: MR RoBug
description:
You control the alien character, and your RoBug unit mimics your movement! Us A & D to move left and right, and Space to make the alien jump! The RoBug unit's legs aren't long enough to jump, so use the jump pads to get it onto different platforms!

To beat a level, collect the key with your alien, then get the robot through the door before you go through!

The puzzles are quite simple, but this is my first time taking part in any game jam, and I'm just proud I got anything submitted at all! Thanks for playing!

Created in 48 hours as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

GAME ASSETS - Kenny.nl

BACKGROUND MUSIC - Eric Matyas – soundimage.org

FANFARE - bevibeldesign - freesound.org
